trans-unit.source: Creates the theme specific-look for headers in .NET Framework 4.5 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush%2A> properties are set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, the rendering reverts back to the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> implementation.
XAML Object Element Usage
XAML Values
An xmlns prefix for the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes> CLR namespace.
Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
*singleChild*
A single object element child, representing the object that the border is drawn around.
This object must be a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header is clickable.

If <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsClickable%2A> is `false`, the hover look will not be applied even when <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsHovered%2A> is `true`.
`true` if the header clickable; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `true`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsClickable"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears as if the mouse pointer is moved over it.
`true` if the header appears as if the mouse pointer is moved over it; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `false`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsHovered"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears pressed.
`true` if the header appears pressed; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `false`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsPressed"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears selected.
`true` if the header appears selected; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `false`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsSelected"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets whether the header renders in the vertical direction, as a column header, or horizontal direction, as a row header.
One of the enumeration values that indicates which direction the header renders.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.Orientation"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the brush that draws the separation between headers.
The brush that draws the separation between headers.
The registered default is `null`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorBrush"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the separation between headers is visible.
One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorBrush"></xref> is visible.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility.Visible"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorVisibility"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the header sort direction.
One of the enumeration values that indicates which direction the column is sorted.
The registered default is `null`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SortDirection"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the header theme color.
Represents possible color variants for the Microsoft themes.
Identifies the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.ThemeColor"></xref> dependency property.
